description: A simple accompaniment that works well with meat dishes, this is a good way to encourage kids to try swede.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Mashed Carrots & Swede Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the vegetables together in a large pan of boiling salted water for about 20 minutes, or until soft. Drain well and return them to the pan.
Add the remaining ingredients and mash the vegetables well before serving.
